channel.title: Custom Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API
channel.description: Recent content in   Custom Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/{base_emoji}`
item.description: Use this endpoint to combine face Twemojis using one as a base. Arguments Name Required Type Default base_emoji ✅ String (emoji) none head ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji cheeks ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji mouth ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji nose ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji eyes ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji eyewear ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji headwear ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji other ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji Chart.

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/mashup`
item.description: Use this endpoint to combine two or more face Twemojis. This differs from /random in that it is emoji-first, allowing more control over emoji selection. Check out the live demo Arguments Name Required Type Default amount ❌ Integer 2 emojis ❌ Strings (comma separated emojis) none use_every_feature ❌ Boolean false head ❌ Float 1.

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/random`
item.description: Use this endpoint to randomly combine face Twemojis. This differs from /mashup in that it is feature-first and offers less control over emoji selection. Check out the live demo Arguments Name Required Type Default head ❌ Float 1.0 cheeks ❌ Float 0.
